title: George Takei
summary: George Takei (/təˈkeɪ/; Japanese: ジョージ・タケイ, born Hosato Takei; April 20, 1937) is an American actor and activist. He is internationally known for his role as Hikaru Sulu, helmsman of the fictional starship USS Enterprise in the television series Star Trek and subsequent films.[1][2]
